name: Visor
description:
Made for the Florida Poly Media Club Respawn Game Jam 2020

A short technical demo game where you can only touch things you can see.

There are many layers to this strange, seemingly blank world.

Everything was produced by me during the 72 hour game jam except:

-FPS Controller Script Base: Sharpcoder Blog

-Scene Fading Asset: NEGLEFT 

Engine: Unity 2019.4.12f
